name: RemoveHiringTeamMember
description:
Remove a user from the hiring team at the application level.

This tool removes an Ashby user from the hiring team for a specific application. It requires the `candidateWrite` permission to perform the action.

parameters.name: hiring_team_removal_details
parameters.description: JSON containing `applicationId`, `teamMemberId`, and `roleId` to specify which user to remove from which application and role.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
